en.title: [Mar 2025] Economic Statistics Review
en.description: Review and analysis of key economic statistics, covering the domestic sector, external sector, labour markets, and prices.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest monthly economic statistics review., covering the domestic sector, external sector, labour markets, and prices.

bm.title: [Mac 2025] Sorotan Statistik Ekonomi
bm.description: Sorotan dan analisis statistik ekonomi penting, merangkumi sektor domestik, sektor luaran, pasarah buruh, dan harga.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan sorotan statistik ekonomi bulanan terkini, merangkumi sektor domestik, sektor luaran, pasarah buruh, dan harga.
